import React from "react"; import '../assets/css/eventform.css' class Eventregister extends React.Component{ state = { fname: "", lname: "", phnumber: "", city: "", age: "", kidsnum: "" } handleChange = event => { this.setState({fname: event.target.value()}) } handle render() { return(
Hello Desktop
); } } export default Eventregister;
